sn46.22:3.1: 22 A Teaching on the Awakening Factors
sn46.22:4.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the seven awakening factors.
sn46.22:4.3: And what are the seven awakening factors?
sn46.22:4.4: The awakening-factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, samādhi, and equanimity.
sn46.22:4.6: These are the seven awakening factors.”
